resources.string: Selly sells sea shells on the sea shore
Hello %1$s World. How are %2$s you? Be creative with the second parameter
Boom, let\'s see you translate this
Harry & Dumbledore go to the beach
Sally told her its @ and not a ear
Name of link You should probably mark this as untranslatable. But here we are trying to debug edge cases

Hello World ! 
This is some test message 

Even with double return!

string-array.item: Do I have to have an account to search and view information?
